name: Super Smash 64
description:
Controls:
- P1 - AD to move left/right, W to jump/double jump, S to duck through one-ways and Q to attack/punch
- P2 - Arrow Keys to move, Right Control to punch

This project has been on my wait list for a long time, and I have finally started it. The models were originally OBJ and MLT files, so I used this online 3d viewer to see/convert them into GLBs. The GLBs I then imported into THREE.js and drew them with some placements.

I plan to work on this more, and to see updates/pre-releases go to super-smash-64.glitch.me. Or visit glitch.com and search "super smash 64".

Hope you enjoy these few days of work!
